effect.u_message: You feel a severe itching sensation.
Your skin tingles as the poison begins to work its way out of your body.

false_effect.u_message: You're not suffering from poisoning and have nothing to detoxify.
You're feeling refreshed and have no need to meditate.
You are fully refreshed, and end your meditations.

effect.u_message: You exit your trance and your wounds feel less painful

//: Hay fever is the immune system overreacting to environmental "contaminants".  If you supercharge your immune system, it's going to react more strongly.

effect.u_message: Your eyes burn and your nose is clogged with mucus.

false_effect.u_message: You have no radiation in your body, and so no need to do anything.

descriptions: Attempt to cure your minor illnesses.
Attempt to cure your chemical imbalance.
Attempt to cure your kaluptic psychosis.
Attempt to cure your mood swings.
Attempt to cure your weakening sickness.
Attempt to cure your narcolepsy.  This meditation is extremely intensive, and is correspondingly more draining.
Attempt to cure your seasonal allergies.
Attempt to cure your seasonal affective disorder.

false_effect.u_message: You're not sick.  There is nothing to cure.
The ailment proved tenacious.  You'll have to try again.
You don't have asthma.  There is no need to attempt to cure it.
The disease proved tenacious.  You'll have to try again.
You don't have a chemical imbalance.  There is no need to attempt to cure it.
The disease proved tenacious.  You'll have to try again.
You don't have kaluptic psychosis.  There is no need to attempt to cure it.
The disease proved tenacious.  You'll have to try again.
You don't have muscle jitters.  There is no need to attempt to cure it.
The disease proved tenacious.  You'll have to try again.
You don't have mood swings.  There is no need to attempt to cure it.
The disease proved tenacious.  You'll have to try again.
You don't have a weakening sickness.  There is no need to attempt to cure it.
The disease proved tenacious.  You'll have to try again.
You don't have narcolepsy.  There is no need to attempt to cure it.
The disease proved tenacious.  You'll have to try again.
You don't have seasonal allergies.  There is no need to attempt to cure it.

effect.u_message: You take a deep breath and your nose and throat clears.

false_effect.u_message: The disease proved tenacious.  You'll have to try again.
You don't have seasonal affective disorder.  There is no need to attempt to cure it.

effect.u_message: You genuinely smile for the first time in a while.  Maybe it won't be so bad.

false_effect.u_message: The disease proved tenacious.  You'll have to try again.

effect.npc_message: Your target's flesh begins decaying before your eyes!
Your target's flesh begins decaying before your eyes!

false_effect.npc_message: Your target has no biology to affect!

effect.u_message: As the wounds overtake you, you feel your powers go into overdrive.
